resources.string: Test your knowledge in Greek Mythology! Answer the following questions and submit when finished!
#1)Who is the Greek God of time?
#2)Who is the king of the Gods?
#3)Poseidon is the God of the Sea and...?
#4)Hades is best known for kidnapping which minor Godess?
#5)Hermes symbol is what now popular medical symbol?
#7)Which sneaker is named after the Greek goddess of victory?
